name: resume_detailed
description: Comprehensive resume extraction template for skills, experience, education, and certifications
prompt: Extract detailed resume information including personal details, professional summary, work experience with responsibilities, education, skills categorized by type, certifications, and achievements. Preserve exact text and provide structured attributes.

examples.text:
SARAH JOHNSON
Senior Data Scientist

Contact Information:
Email: sarah.johnson@email.com
Phone: (555) 987-6543
LinkedIn: linkedin.com/in/sarahjohnson
Location: San Francisco, CA

PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY
Experienced Data Scientist with 6+ years developing machine learning models and analytics solutions. Expertise in Python, R, and cloud platforms.

WORK EXPERIENCE

Senior Data Scientist | DataTech Inc. | Jan 2021 - Present
• Led development of predictive models improving customer retention by 25%
• Managed team of 4 junior data scientists
• Implemented MLOps pipelines using AWS and Docker
• Published 3 research papers in peer-reviewed journals

Data Scientist | Analytics Corp | Jun 2018 - Dec 2020
• Built recommendation systems serving 1M+ users daily
• Reduced model training time by 40% through optimization
• Collaborated with product teams on A/B testing frameworks

EDUCATION
M.S. Data Science | Stanford University | 2018
GPA: 3.9/4.0, Thesis: "Deep Learning for Time Series Forecasting"

B.S. Computer Science | UC Berkeley | 2016
GPA: 3.7/4.0, Magna Cum Laude

SKILLS
Programming: Python, R, SQL, Java, Scala
Machine Learning: TensorFlow, PyTorch, Scikit-learn, XGBoost
Cloud Platforms: AWS, GCP, Azure
Tools: Git, Docker, Kubernetes, Airflow

CERTIFICATIONS
• AWS Certified Machine Learning - Specialty (2023)
• Google Cloud Professional Data Engineer (2022)
• Certified Analytics Professional (CAP) (2021)

extractions.extraction_text: Senior Data Scientist | DataTech Inc. | Jan 2021 - Present
